meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joan King Diego Cordovez Eric Terzuolo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1353.

td.p: Joan King, a renovator from Tampa, Florida
Diego Cordovez, a venture capitalist from Palo Alto, California
Eric Terzuolo, a foreign service officer from Washington, D.C. (whose 3-day cash winnings total $34,900)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL TRIVIA
POP MUSIC
ENGLISH LITERATURE
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
TELEVISION
FAMILIAR PHRASES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_1', 'clue_DJ_2_1_stuck', '(Alex: [Before revealing the categories] Before we get into the Double Jeopardy! round I want to mention something that I\'m sure our devoted fans would have noticed about the first round and that is the fact that all of the correct responses in the Jeopardy! round included a "John." There was a "John" featured in every correct response. I can assure you players that in this Double Jeopardy! round that will no longer be the case. That would have been asking too much of Steven Dorfman who prepared all the material in that one.)

Greece

Diego
')
